QueryToExecute:
select
  a.id as resource,
  case
    when sku_name = 'standard' then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
    a.name || ' has ' || sku_name || ' SKU tier.' as reason
  
  , a.resource_group as resource_group
  , sub.display_name as subscription
from
  azure_app_configuration as a,
  azure_subscription as sub;
